title: Isolate
text: To isolate $$y$$, we can add $$4x$$ to both sides of the equation, which gives us $$y=-6+4x$$.
speech: To isolate  y , we can add  4 x  to both sides of the equation, which gives us  y is equal to, negative 6 plus 4 x .
pacedSpeech: to both sides of the equation, which gives us   y is equal to, negative 6 plus 4 x
